Commands.Catch&Lash: 4-hit melee BRV attack  Extra damage to targets afflicted with Snakebite  Target: 6 turns 1 level of Snakebite (limit 3)  (Cancels, resets levels of Snakebite inflicted previously on different target)
Commands.Elementalash: Fire Ice Thunder melee BRV attack + HP attack

Artifacts.Debuff Guard Up: Raises Defense Power by 10% while an enemy is debuffed
Artifacts.All-Seeing Eye Boost: Increases the effects of All-Seeing Eye by 5%
Artifacts.Mighty Catch&Lash: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Catch&Lash by 10%
Artifacts.Mighty Elementalash: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Elementalash by 10%

Passives.Catch&Lash Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Catch&Lash.
Passives.Break Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Start Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 3 turns when the battle starts.
Passives.Elementalash Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Elementalash.
Passives.Debuff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Catch&Lash Charge: Increases the max uses of Catch&Lash by 1.
Passives.Debuff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Elementalash Charge: Increases the max uses of Elementalash by 1.
Passives.All-Seeing Eye: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense while an enemy is afflicted with Snakebite.
Passives.Debuff Attack Speed: Slightly raises ATK, SPD while an enemy is debuffed
Passives.Snakebite & Lash Extension: When using Snakebite & Lash:   Large damage boost   Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%   Triggers additional HP attack if BRV is at least 100% of MAX after last hit   Higher turn rate when inflicting Break or attacking target inflicted with Break
Passives.Debuffed Attack Boost Up: Slightly raises MAX BRV, ATK while an enemy is debuffed
Passives.Elementalash Extension: Elementalash use +1When using Elementalash:   Becomes 3-hit BRV attack; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage   Self: 6 turns ATK Up I   Higher turn rate when inflicting Break or attacking target inflicted with BreakAfter using Elementalash:   BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (powerful Fire Ice Thunder ranged BRV attack) for 6 turns

Weapons.Silver Whipblade CP: 15: Raises the potency of Catch&Lash.Grants Small Max BRV Up for 6 turns.
Weapons.Platinum Whipblade CP: 35: Raises the potency of Elementalash.Inflicts Small Speed Down on target for 4 turns.If the enemy is afflicted by Snakebite, Elementalash will strike again.
